briefTitle: The Bihormonal iLet Bionic Pancreas Feasibility Study
officialTitle: The Bihormonal iLet Bionic Pancreas Feasibility Study

arms.label: Bihormonal iLet first, then Insulin-Only iLet
Insulin-Only iLet first, then Bihormonal iLet

summary: Our objective is to evaluate the function of the bihormonal configuration of the ILet bionic pancreas delivering dasiglucagon when compared to the insulin-only configuration of the ILet bionic pancreas in a home-use study in adults with type 1 diabetes.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Time That Valid CGM Glucose Readings Are Captured by the iLet Bionic Pancreas
